author: Charlie Floyd
title: This is how craft beer is brewed at Beavertown — one of the UK's biggest craft breweries
description: This liquid is filtered using a whirlpool and the used barley is taken away and used for animal feed. Once filtered yeast is added to the mixture and it is left to ferment. The fermentation process takes three or four days. Once fermented more hops are added, this process is called dry hopping.
